short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to easily translate selected text and display it in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to easily translate selected text to and from 10 different languages. This extension is designed to be super simple. 
This is best used for quick and simple translations rather than to translate a very long web page or a book. Just a quick and convenient translation extension.

1. Highlight any text on a web page
2. Right-click
3. Select to translate. A popup will appear at the left side of the page with the translated content.

You can choose your language after pinning the extension in chrome.

Translate to/from:
- 🇺🇸 English
- 🇨🇳 Chinese (Simplified)
- 🇮🇳 Hindi
- 🇪🇸 Spanish
- 🇸🇦 Arabic
- 🇫🇷 French
- 🇷🇺 Russian
- 🇵🇹 Portuguese
- 🇩🇪 German
- 🇯🇵 Japanese


The popup bubble will appear for duration's of 5, 10, and 20 seconds depending on the amount of text.

Want to suggest an improvement? I'll act quickly! ;)
Just shoot me an email at mfhawley5@gmail.com
